text: So be watchful all the time, praying that you may be counted worthyInstead of ‘counted worthy’, less than 2% of the Greek manuscripts, of objectively inferior quality, have ‘be able’ (as in NIV, NASB, LB, TEV, etc.). to escape all these thingsIf ‘to escape all these things’ refers to the Rapture, then only those who are ‘counted worthy’ will go up. that are about to happen and to stand before the Son of the Man.”
